mapper.select: select boNum, boContent, boRegDate, boTitle, boUpdateDate, boViews, boLikes, boURL, memNum from( select rownum rn, boNum, boContent, boRegDate, boTitle, boUpdateDate, boViews, boLikes, boURL, memNum from commboard where rownum <= (#{page}*#{amount}) order by boNum desc ) where rn > ((#{page}-1)*#{amount})
mapper.insert: insert into commboard (boNum, boContent, boTitle, boURL, memNum) values(seq_board.nextval, #{boContent}, #{boTitle}, #{boURL}, #{memNum})
mapper.update: update commboard set boContent=#{boContent}, boTitle=#{boTitle}, boURL=#{boURL}, memNum=#{memNum} boUpdateDate=sysdate where boNum=#{boNum}
